comments:
I created a url test by recording and then generating the code. The test ran 
with a failure ant one requet failed. I "removed" request 20 from the HTTP 
request tab in the testsuite editor, and when I tried to save I got an 
exception.
Then on an attempt to clsoe the editor without saving I got this exeption

*** Bug 92576 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Moving this back to Hyades 3.3 because this is one of the two defects that is
critical for 3.3. (Other being 95072 and then there's the translation fragments.)

Joe gave me a fix for this (fix is in hand and tested); I plan on reviewing 
with Marius and then once approved will deliver into TPTP 3.3 HEAD.
I applied and checked in the patch for delete and unload resource (object).
